about.title: About Juan Gomez
about.description: Sometimes I write code. Other times, I rewrite code until it works perfectly.

present.name: Full stack developer
present.content: As a software developer, my integrity and discipline are complemented by an entrepreneurial mindset. My ability to work as a team is balanced with a constant desire to learn and grow. i am passionate about personal improvement and self-study every day.

synergias.name: Full Stack Developer / Synergias
synergias.content: In my role, I use the Scrum methodology and develop the backend with the .NET framework in C#. For the frontend, I use React and SQLServer for database management.

cpr.name: Full Stack Developer / CPR Servicios y Consultor铆a SAS
cpr.content: At CPR, I used frameworks such as Angular, Node.js, and .NET, with languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, and SCSS. I used design libraries like Angular Material, DevExtreme, and Bootstrap, and MySQL databases. I also worked with tools like AWS (S3, EC2), Jenkins, SonarQube, Jira, HeidiSql, and Slack.

solredes.name: Web Developer / Solredes SAS
solredes.content: I focused primarily on frontend development. During this period, I worked with a variety of frameworks and programming languages, including JSF, Angular, React and Flutter, as well as Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, XHTML, CSS and SCSS. In addition, I used design libraries such as Angular Material, PrimeNG, PrimeFaces and PrimeReact, and databases such as MySql, PostgreSQL and Oracle.

index.title: Hey there
index.subtitle: I'm Juan Carlos Gomez
index.description: I am in my last semester of telematics engineering at Universidad Distrital, I am a passionate and dedicated software developer focused on web development.
